title: Harworth: Two horses die in crash with car
article: Two horses thought to have escaped from a field have died after being hit by a car in Nottinghamshire. Scrooby Road in Harworth, near Worksop, was closed in both directions after the crash at about 07:00 GMT on Sunday. Police said one horse died at the scene and a second was later euthanised due to the extent of its injuries.The Nottinghamshire force added a third horse - also thought to have come from a nearby field - was safely rescued by officers.The driver of the car suffered whiplash injuries but was not taken to hospital.Insp Alice Bartle said: "This was a very sad incident and our thoughts are with the owners of the two horses."
